name: Fix Failing Tests
description: Repair broken test suite and restore passing state
prompt:
Task: Fix all failing tests in the test suite
Scope: tests/**; src/**
Constraints: Preserve test intent; fix root cause not symptoms; maintain or improve coverage; avoid breaking changes to public APIs
Checks: pytest -v; ruff check .; mypy src/ --ignore-missing-imports
Artifacts: Updated test files with fixes; optional: docs/test-fixes-{DATE}.md documenting changes
Commit: fix(tests): repair failing test suite
Context: Run pytest -v first to identify all failures; analyze error messages and tracebacks; check for recent code changes that may have broken tests
Limits: {"max_iterations": 10, "soft_time": "20m"}
Success: All tests pass; no new test failures introduced; coverage not decreased; type checking passes
usage: Run as-is to fix all failing tests, or customize Scope to target specific test files
